name: SwaminarayanGadi
0:
”Alexa, open Swaminarayan Temple”
”Alexa, quote from Swaminarayan Temple”
”Alexa, today's events from Swaminarayan Temple”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: swaminarayan temple
des:
The Swaminarayan Gadi Skill can give quotes, events and images from Maninagar darshan.

You can call this skill by saying
"Alexa, open Swaminarayan Temple" 

Pronounced [swaa·me·naa·ra·yuhn tem·pl]

Specific invocations:
"Alexa, quote from Swaminarayan Temple" to give you a quote.
"Alexa, song from Swaminarayan Temple" to play a Kirtan. Say 'next' or 'shuffle' to navigate through the Kirtans. [*]
"Alexa, images from Swaminarayan Temple" to give you images from today's darshan.
"Alexa, today's events from Swaminarayan Temple" to give you today's auspicious events.
"Alexa, next events from Swaminarayan Temple" to give you the future auspicious events.
"Alexa, fasting from Swaminarayan Temple" to give you the next fasting/ Ekadashi dates.

[*] Please note, the Kirtan (Devotional Song) will be played in the Hindi/ Gujarati Language.


A richer experience is available on Amazon Alexa devices with a screen, such as the Echo Show, Fire TVs, and Alexa-enabled tablets.
Some invocations, for example images for darshan, will only be usable with Amazon Alexa devices with a screen.

Building more abilities to be released soon!
Feature requests encouraged: Scroll down to Send Feedback > Add Device > I'd like a new feature > Describe the problem > Request Help

This skill is now available in UK/IE, AU, CA, IN and US.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
